data.name: Achievement Dummy
data.detailed_description:
Here is a simple but very fun game that will definitely help you relieve stress after a hard day or just have fun. At your disposal an Arsenal of a variety of items, eager for destruction. And one unfortunate mannequin, who will experience all their action. Try to do as much damage as possible with minimal cost to complete all levels. Or just have fun in the sandbox!

Features:

  • Fun game;
  • There is a sandbox mode;
  • Many levels;
  • Suitable for Windows, Mac and Linux.

Would you like to find out what can cause more damage - spiked wall, six-barrel minigun or rocket launcher? Would you like to arrange for your dummy real ping pong? Then rather go into the game and try all the means of destruction that will be kindly offered to you for damage. Among them you will find mines, automatic crossbow, six-barrel, rocket launcher, spikes, saw, edged weapons, repulsive surfaces and much more. A whole Arsenal at your disposal. Have fun and have fun at your leisure. Many levels in the game will not let you get bored.

data.short_description: Build the most terrible room for tests and cause as much damage to the wooden dummy. Test on a dummy the most variety of weapons!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: DualCore
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.11+
  • Processor: DualCore
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
